title: Glastonbury: Mel C says The Spice Girls 'have chatted' about playing festival
content: This video can not be playedMel C drew a big crowd when she DJ'd at the Glastonbury Festival on Thursday.The morning after, she told entertainment correspondent Colin Paterson on BBC Breakfast that playing on the Sunday afternoon legends' slot with the Spice Girls in the future would be "the absolute dream" - and that Victoria Beckham might even rejoin them if they did.
